General.Name: Lippo General Insurance Tbk
General.Description: PT Lippo General Insurance Tbk provides various insurance products in Indonesia. The company offers fire, motor vehicles, credit insurance and bonds, marine cargo, health, life and death, and other insurance products. It operates through branches and marketing offices located in Karawaci, Medan, Surabaya, Palembang, Bandung, Semarang, Solo, Pekanbaru, Cikarang, Makassar, Balikpapan, and Bali. The company was formerly known as PT Asuransi Marga Pusaka and changed its name to PT Lippo General Insurance Tbk in July 1991. PT Lippo General Insurance Tbk was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan.
General.Address: Lippo Kuningan Building, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12940
